verses.verse: Let not <S%G3361><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> be troubled: <S%G5015><s%> ye believe <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> me. <S%G1691><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father's <S%G3962><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> mansions: <S%G3438><s%> if it were not <S%G1490><s%> so, I would have told <S%G2036><s%> <S%G302><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%> I go <S%G4198><s%> to prepare <S%G2090><s%> a place <S%G5117><s%> for you. <S%G5213><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I go <S%G4198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prepare <S%G2090><s%> a place <S%G5117><s%> for you, <S%G5213><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> receive <S%G3880><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> myself; <S%G1683><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am, <S%G1510><s%> there ye <S%G5210><s%> may be <S%G5600><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

Thomas <S%G2381><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> whither <S%G4226><s%> thou goest; <S%G5217><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> way? <S%G3598><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> ye had known <S%G1097><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> ye should have known <S%G1097><s%> <S%G302><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> also: <S%G2532><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> henceforth <S%G737><s%> ye know <S%G1097><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have seen <S%G3708><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Philip <S%G5376><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> show <S%G1166><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it sufficeth <S%G714><s%> us. <S%G2254><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Have I been <S%G1510><s%> so long <S%G5118><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> yet hast thou not <S%G3756><s%> known <S%G1097><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> Philip? <S%G5376><s%> he that hath seen <S%G3708><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> hath seen <S%G3708><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father; <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> sayest <S%G3004><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> then, Show <S%G1166><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father? <S%G3962><s%>

Believest <S%G4100><s%> thou not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me? <S%G1698><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G575><s%> myself: <S%G1683><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> that dwelleth <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me, <S%G1698><s%> he <S%G846><s%> doeth <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%>

Believe <S%G4100><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me: <S%G1698><s%> or else <S%G1490><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> for the very works' sake. <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2041><s%>

Verily, <S%G281><s%> verily, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> He that believeth <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> me, <S%G1691><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> shall he do also; <S%G2548><s%> <S%G4160><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> greater <S%G3187><s%> works than these <S%G5130><s%> shall he do; <S%G4160><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> whatsoever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> ye shall ask <S%G154><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> will I do, <S%G4160><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> may be glorified <S%G1392><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son. <S%G5207><s%>
If <S%G1437><s%> ye shall ask <S%G154><s%> any thing <S%G5100><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will do <S%G4160><s%> it.
If <S%G1437><s%> ye love <S%G25><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> keep <S%G5083><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> commandments. <S%G1785><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will pray <S%G2065><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he shall give <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> another <S%G243><s%> Comforter, <S%G3875><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he may abide <S%G3306><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> forever; <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%>

Even the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of truth; <S%G225><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> receive, <S%G2983><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> it seeth <S%G2334><s%> him <S%G846><s%> not, <S%G3756><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> knoweth <S%G1097><s%> him: <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> him; <S%G846><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> he dwelleth <S%G3306><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%>
I will not <S%G3756><s%> leave <S%G863><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> comfortless: <S%G3737><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

Yet <S%G2089><s%> a little while, <S%G3397><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> seeth <S%G2334><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> more; <S%G2089><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> see <S%G2334><s%> me: <S%G3165><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> live, <S%G2198><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> shall live <S%G2198><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

He that hath <S%G2192><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> commandments, <S%G1785><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> keepeth <S%G5083><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> that loveth <S%G25><s%> me: <S%G3165><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> he that loveth <S%G25><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> shall be loved <S%G25><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will love <S%G25><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will manifest <S%G1718><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> to him. <S%G846><s%>

Judas <S%G2455><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> how <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G1096><s%> it that <S%G3754><s%> thou wilt <S%G3195><s%> manifest <S%G1718><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> unto us, <S%G2254><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> world? <S%G2889><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> love <S%G25><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> he will keep <S%G5083><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> words: <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> will love <S%G25><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we will come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> our abode <S%G3438><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

He that loveth <S%G25><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> keepeth <S%G5083><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sayings: <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye hear <S%G191><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> mine, <S%G1699><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the Father's <S%G3962><s%> which sent <S%G3992><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>
These things <S%G5023><s%> have I spoken <S%G2980><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> being yet present <S%G3306><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Comforter, <S%G3875><s%> which is the <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> will send <S%G3992><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> shall teach <S%G1321><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bring all things to your remembrance, <S%G5279><s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G5209><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> I have said <S%G2036><s%> unto you. <S%G5213><s%>

Peace <S%G1515><s%> I leave <S%G863><s%> with you, <S%G5213><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> I give <S%G1325><s%> unto you: <S%G5213><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> giveth, <S%G1325><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> unto you. <S%G5213><s%> Let not <S%G3361><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> be troubled, <S%G5015><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> let it be afraid. <S%G1168><s%>

Ye have heard <S%G191><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> I go away, <S%G5217><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> again unto <S%G4314><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> ye loved <S%G25><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> ye would rejoice, <S%G5463><s%> <S%G302><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I said, <S%G2036><s%> I go <S%G4198><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father: <S%G3962><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> greater <S%G3187><s%> than I. <S%G3450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> I have told <S%G2046><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> before <S%G4250><s%> it come to pass, <S%G1096><s%> that, <S%G2443><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> it is come to pass, <S%G1096><s%> ye might believe. <S%G4100><s%>

Hereafter <S%G2089><s%> I will not <S%G3756><s%> talk <S%G2980><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you: <S%G5216><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prince <S%G758><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> cometh, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3756><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me. <S%G1698><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> may know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I love <S%G25><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father; <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> gave me commandment, <S%G1781><s%> <S%G3427><s%> even so <S%G3779><s%> I do. <S%G4160><s%> Arise, <S%G1453><s%> let us go <S%G71><s%> hence. <S%G1782><s%>
